import { Callout, Steps, Tab, Tabs } from 'nextra/components';

# API Reference

<Callout type="warning">
  This API is in beta. Breaking changes may occur.
</Callout>

## Authentication

<Steps>

### Get an API Key

Sign up at the dashboard to get your key.

### Configure the Client

```go
client := sdk.NewClient(
    sdk.WithAPIKey(os.Getenv("API_KEY")),
    sdk.WithTimeout(30 * time.Second),
)
```

### Make Your First Request

```go
resp, err := client.Get(ctx, "/users")
if err != nil {
    log.Fatal(err)
}
```

</Steps>

## Endpoints

<Tabs items={['REST', 'GraphQL']}>
<Tab>

All REST endpoints use JSON:

| Method | Path       | Description     |
|--------|------------|-----------------|
| GET    | /users     | List users      |
| POST   | /users     | Create user     |
| GET    | /users/:id | Get user detail |

</Tab>
<Tab>

GraphQL endpoint: `/graphql`

```graphql
query {
  users(first: 10) {
    id
    name
    email
  }
}
```

</Tab>
</Tabs>

## Error Codes

| Code | Meaning           |
|------|-------------------|
| 400  | Bad request       |
| 401  | Unauthorized      |
| 404  | Not found         |
| 429  | Rate limited      |
| 500  | Internal error    |

export default function Layout({ children }) {
  return <div className="api-docs">{children}</div>;
}
